thread.title: BRIEF-Hasbro Named Global Master Toy Licensee For Saban's Power Rangers

title: BRIEF-Hasbro Named Global Master Toy Licensee For Saban's Power Rangers
text: February 16, 2018 / 4:21 PM / in 14 minutes BRIEF-Hasbro Named Global Master Toy Licensee For Saban's Power Rangers Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - Hasbro Inc: * HASBRO NAMED GLOBAL MASTER TOY LICENSEE FOR SABAN’S POWER RANGERS * HASBRO INC - WILL HOLD WORLDWIDE RIGHTS FOR SABAN‘S POWER RANGERS, EXCLUDING JAPAN AND CERTAIN OTHER ASIAN MARKETS, EFFECTIVE AS OF APRIL 1, 2019 * HASBRO - ‍ FIRST SET OF PRODUCTS FROM COLLABORATION WITH SABAN BRANDS TO BE AVAILABLE IN SPRING 2019​ * HASBRO INC - ‍ ARRANGEMENT PROVIDES CO WITH OPPORTUNITY TO INITIATE PURCHASE OF POWER RANGERS PROPERTY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
